name: 3D Motor Bike Rally Crazy Run: Offroad Escape from the Temple of Doom Free Racing Game
name_original: 3D Motor Bike Rally Crazy Run: Offroad Escape from the Temple of Doom Free Racing Game
description:
Can you think on your feet? Because you’ll definitely need that, in this fast paced racing game. You’ll have 4 different machines at your disposal. City scooter, low chopper, enduro bike and insanely fast super bike! All of them are meticulously designed. to give you a realistic racing experience and all are equipped with nitrous oxide, to deliver some boost in these tight situations. So put on your helmet, avoid the traffic and be the first at the finish line!

Game features:

- Jaw dropping 3D graphics
- Great sound effects
- Intense gameplay
- 4 Awesome bikes to race
- Different controllers to suit your play style
